name: Agile Scrum Simulator
description:
"Individuals and interactions over processes and tools"

Your task: Assemble the best rocket in the world

Your Agile Methodology Tool: SCRUM!!!

Try to complete your task while over process gets in your way at every turn and deliver a rocket that would make your parents proud!

Controls:

  • Left Mouse to Interact or Pick Up objects
  • Scroll to move picked up objects further or nearer

A game by:

  • Francisco Bicho
  • João Eiras Antunes
  • João Machado
  • Luís Pinto

Disclaimer: SCRUM is not a bad tool. However, it is easy to forget the point of it and hold it as more valuable than actual development. Do not overdose it.
